## MediaGalleryEntry interface

MediaGalleryEntry defines characteristics about images and videos associated with a specific product.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface MediaGalleryEntry 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [content?](./magento-api.mediagalleryentry.content.md) | Maybe&lt;[ProductMediaGalleryEntriesContent](./magento-api.productmediagalleryentriescontent.md)<!-- -->&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Contains a ProductMediaGalleryEntriesContent object. |
|  [disabled?](./magento-api.mediagalleryentry.disabled.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['Boolean'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Whether the image is hidden from view. |
|  [file?](./magento-api.mediagalleryentry.file.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['String'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The path of the image on the server. |
|  [id?](./magento-api.mediagalleryentry.id.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['Int'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The identifier assigned to the object. |
|  [label?](./magento-api.mediagalleryentry.label.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['String'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The alt text displayed on the UI when the user points to the image. |
|  [media\_type?](./magento-api.mediagalleryentry.media_type.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['String'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> image or video. |
|  [position?](./magento-api.mediagalleryentry.position.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['Int'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The media item's position after it has been sorted. |
|  [types?](./magento-api.mediagalleryentry.types.md) | Maybe&lt;Array&lt;Maybe&lt;Scalars\['String'\]&gt;&gt;&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Array of image types. It can have the following values: image, small\_image, thumbnail. |
|  [uid](./magento-api.mediagalleryentry.uid.md) | Scalars\['ID'\] | The unique ID for a <code>MediaGalleryEntry</code> object. |
